src

PitchName.cpp File Reference

Detailed Description

Utilities for converting from frequency to pitch and from pitch to absolute (e.g., C4 for middle C) or nominal (A through G#) pitch name.

#include <math.h>
#include <stdio.h>
#include "PitchName.h"
